com.polarion.core.util.types

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polarion.core.util.types.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the implementation of the primitive type to be used in the model objects. The differences between the String and this type is mainly in the presentation to the user: Text is multi-line string and therefore appropriate editor should be provided.
    Author:
    dobisekm
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isContentLossy

        public boolean isContentLossy()
        Returns true, if a lossy format conversion was done on this Text (see converTo... methods).

        It is not recommended to make modifications based on lossy texts.

      • isPlain

        public boolean isPlain()
        Shortcut for TYPE_PLAIN.equals(type);

      • isHtml

        public boolean isHtml()
        Shortcut for TYPE_HTML.equals(type);

      • convertToPlainText

        @NotNull
public Text convertToPlainText()
        Converts this Text to the plain text. If it's already plain text, then this is returned. Otherwise the content is converted to plain text (html tags are removed) and new Text instance is created.

        Note, that this function is lossy - the informaiton on about the HTML tags is lost forever. Therefore it's advised to never transform between HTML and plain text multiple times.

        Returns:
        New Text instance with type TYPE_PLAIN
        See Also:
        convertToHTML(), HTMLHelper.convertHTMLToPlain(String)

      • convertToHTML

        @NotNull
public Text convertToHTML()
        Converts this Text to HTML text. If it's already HTML text, then this is returned. Otherwise the content is converted to HTML by escaping characters, which have special meaning in HTML or which are ignored in HTML.

        Note that this function is lossy - there is no guarantee, that converting the HTML back to plain will produce the original text.

        Returns:
        New Text instance with type "text/html"
        See Also:
        convertToPlainText(), HTMLHelper.convertPlainToHTML(String)
